import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Lectures=_ref=>{let{user}=_ref;const[lecturers,setLecturers]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{fetchLecturers();},[]);const fetchLecturers=async()=>{try{const response=await getPLLecturers();setLecturers(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching lecturers:',error);}finally{setLoading(false);}};if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading lecturers..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"Lecturer Management"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-body",children:lecturers.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No lecturers found."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"table-responsive",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"table table-striped",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Faculty"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Status"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Actions"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:lecturers.map(lecturer=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:lecturer.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:lecturer.email}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:lecturer.faculty}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"badge bg-success",children:"Active"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-primary btn-sm me-1",children:"View"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-warning btn-sm",children:"Edit"})]})]},lecturer.id))})]})})})]});};export default Lectures;
